action_item: Users & Roles - Update meeting invites to include a reminder for participants to be ready to share their NextGen screen.
notes: Participants seem unaware of the requirement to share their screens.

action_item: Requirements - Send an email detailing the expectations around using NextGen.
notes: Angeline to clarify what information needs to be inputted into NextGen.

action_item: Requirements - Gather requirements for a case management portal in NextGen.
notes: Current workaround is not ideal; need a proper case management section without triggering billing.

action_item: Requirements - Set up non-billable appointment types and calendar categories in Dr. Cloud EHR.
notes: Need to ensure that services provided at non-billable locations are set up correctly.

action_item: Data Migration - Share any documentation regarding the information that needs to be inputted into NextGen.
notes: Documentation should include details of visits and events.

action_item: Workflow - Clarify the workflow for home visits and how documentation will be handled.
notes: Determine if staff will use laptops or notepads for data entry.
